name: Silver Bullet Shooting Gallery
description:
Welcome to the Silver Bullet Shooting Gallery!

The winner of the inaugural Arkade Games Spoopy Jam in 2020, Silver Bullet Shooting Gallery gives you one minute to rack up as high a score as possible! Select and shoot using the mouse and left mouse button, reload by shooting the scoreboard, and stay on your toes for 1 minute, because things are going to speed up!

For a better full screen experience, download the Windows PC version.
